summary: This bill, the Screening for Communities to Receive Early and Equitable Needed Services for Cancer Act of 2025 (SCREENS for Cancer Act of 2025), aims to reauthorize and improve the National Breast and Cervical Cancer Early Detection Program. It amends the Public Health Service Act to enhance program services, address disparities in breast and cervical cancer incidents, and improve equitable access to screenings. It also calls for a GAO study on the program's effectiveness.
